heading: Monday
text: Occasional sunshine in the south and through the valleys during the morning, then increasing clouds, becoming mostly cloudy during the afternoon. Highs in the mid to upper teens in southern valleys and in the Champlain Valley, low to mid teens elsewhere. Lake effect likely in the Tug Hills and Western NY. Highs in the low to mid teens. Westerly winds less than 10 mph gusting to 15.

heading: Monday Night
text: Becoming mostly cloudy. Increasing chance of snow showers over the Northern Greens. Not much colder tonight, temperatures stay in the mid to upper teens. Winds become light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: A few scattered flurries along the international border, dissipating before midday, then becoming mostly sunny. Highs from the mid to lower 20s northeast, and upper 20s to near 30s south. Breezy over Lake Champlain, light and variable elsewhere.
